column4: Im trying to install Opera-browser with this guide: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OperaBrowser . Ive downloaded the .deb and with the command 'sudo dpkg -i <filename>' it returns some error. says packet "ibqt3c102-mt" is not installed. What is this packet, how do I install it?
I ran into that problem the other day trying to install a ham radio program...I think you're using breezy, correct ?
do a google, and see where it leads you
